attributes.action: pass an act of parliament for the creation of state run youth organisations to teach traditional values and provide comfort, discipline, shelter, education and organised events for youth aged 5-18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people of Great Britain ask Prime Minister Gordon Brown to create and provide the above as requested. We ask that all members of staff who are to work in these organisations  are thoroughly checked for any criminal convictions,especially those against children.

We believe it to be essential that all youth should have a safe, organised and secure environment to socialise and gain knowledge.
